item.title: redesign
item.description: I probably won’t end up using the blog portion of Hugo since I already have a blog, but I call it “site updates”.

Hi I’m “B”. By day I’m a tech director for a digital media company and in my free time I like to game, mix music, take photos, tinker with code and travel when I can. I’m currently in the process of re-discoverying my creativity and seeing where it can take me next in my career. I try to write about what I’m up to on Mastodon or my blog. I’m doing a digital overhaul for the next few months.

item.title: /Uses
item.description: All of the gear and software that I use everyday. Hardware Computer Software Development Services Analog Fashion

item.title: Current Projects
item.description: Website redesign I’m redoing my website with Hugo and loving it so far. A while back my brain didn’t click well with static site generators, but now I’m loving it. I’m using the Gokarna theme which is simple yet super customizable. Music Site BinaryDigit.rocks A place to upload my mixes with song lists as a back up to SoundCloud and YouTube/PeerTube. I’ll probably move it to this domain eventually but since I still have Wordpress hosting I am using a nice media wrapper plugin and WP theme.

item.title: Music Mixes
item.description: Video I haven’t uploaded in a while, but here are my current uploads to PeerTube, which is a fediverse video upload site similar to YouTube. You can watch my playlist there as well! Audio I also upload my music to SoundCloud if you want to listen to some mixes I’ve streamed online. I’ve been working on a seperate website for uploading, but might just merge the efforts into my one website here.
